name: places/ChIJv7e2TD1awokRBGtrNu8fsBI
formattedAddress: 70 Fulton St, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 70 Fulton St, New York, NY 10038-1809, USA

originalText.text: I have gone here many times but most recently left with burns under my eye brow that are really painful. For that reason, I won’t be coming back and caution anyone who plans to go to be careful. I have been putting cream on the burn for 3 days and it’s still very painful.

originalText.text: Sarah is a great professional, she takes care of every detail when removing my facial hair. Very Frindly and polite !

text.text: Sarah is a great professional, she takes care of every detail when removing my facial hair. Very Frindly and polite !

originalText.text:
I have trust issues with people who work on my brows. I always went to this one lady all the way by Rockefeller center, because it was near my old job. I work downtown now and always went back uptown (even though I live nowhere near there), just to get my brows threaded.

Recently, I found out that my usual eyebrow person was on a three month vacation, and I desperately needed my brows done before a vacation. So I did some Yelp research and people were raving about NY Brows and Sarah. Plus it was only $7 for threading?! I decided to head there one day during lunch and give her a chance. I’m glad I did because she reshaped my brows without compromising the thickness. I went again about a month later, and she did a wonderful job again. I’m so happy that I found a new brow place nearby. Be prepared to wait at least 15 minutes though because Sarah is very popular!

Tip - they have a loyalty card - go 9 times and get the 10th free!

originalText.text: This is the last time I come here to do my eyebrows. I ask for an arch and it is always done wrong, either my eyebrows are left looking like caterpillars because they have done nothing or two string lines in which they try to convince me they are arches. This place is garbage and do not go to have any service done. That is why its more empty than full because their service has gone downhill 100 percent. I will look elsewhere to have my eyebrows done. They no longer provide quality. I will have to let my eyebrows grow back again to fix the garbage service they have provided. NEVER AGAIN.

originalText.text: I came here for an eyebrow threading and sideburn wax. It was done by Simpy, and her customer service was extremely poor. She was very rude and unmannerable so I will not be coming back to this place. Also, I asked specifically for a sideburn wax and after the wax she started to thread my sideburns without asking for my permission. The pain was almost unbearable and she was very rough with both services. When I paid and tipped her, she did not even thank me for my service or my tip. She just stared at me as if she wanted to say “get out”. I almost wanted to ask for my tip back but decided to be the bigger person and let it go. She is the reason I will go down the street and use another, better waxing service.
